title: Jordyn Woods kids she's pregnant 9 months after Tristan Thompson fling
text:
Jordyn Woods has got fans talking once again after jokingly announcing she’s ‘expecting’ in a new YouTube video.

Kylie Jenner’s former BFF posted a Q&A with her younger sister Jodie, 14, on her channel but awkwardly joked about being pregnant when asked whether she was single or not.

When asked whether she was single and what her ideal man would be like, Jordyn bizarrely replied: ‘Guys, I have an announcement. I am expecting… abs.’

She continued: ‘I am single and I am expecting some abs soon if I keep working for them. The ideal guy for me is someone… it sounds cliché but someone who’s driven, someone who’s passionate, someone that wants to be the best at what they do, someone that is intelligent.

‘I cannot stand not being able to have a conversation with someone, and that’s the case with a lot of these guys out here. They do not know how to hold a conversation.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘I’m not trying to waste my time. A great sense of humour and some style would be nice too. The list could go on and on but I’m not picky.’

Jordyn made the bizarre comments during a Q&A with her little sister (Picture: YouTube/ Jordyn Woods)

Her bizarre answer to that question comes nine months after she was accused of kissing Khloe Kardashian’s baby daddy, Tristan Thompson, which effectively ended the couple’s relationship.

The 22-year-old was then forced to move out of Kylie’s home, where she had been living until then and caused Kylie to cut ties with her former bestie.

She spoke out to deny the claims on Jada Pinkett Smith’s Red Table Talk series, but it wasn’t enough to build bridges with the Kardashian-Jenner family once again.

Jordyn launched her YouTube channel last week, and has already amassed over 123,000 subscribers who are no doubt waiting to hear more about the drama in a tell-all vlog.

description: Jordyn Woods has made an awkward joke about being pregnant nine months after Tristan Thompson cheating scandal.
